author: Academia Sinica Center for Digital Cultures (ASCDC), Taiwan (R.O.C.)

resources.description: The LOD dataset of the archive of the “Chen Cheng-po’s Paintings and Documents” (陳澄波畫作與文書檔) in the Taiwan Archive Information System at the Institute of Taiwan History (ITH), Academia Sinica is created by the Academia Sinica Center for Digital Cultures (ASCDC) and based on the metadata from online database of the “Taiwan Archive Information System” (臺灣史檔案資源系統, http://tais.ith.sinica.edu.tw/sinicafrsFront/browsingLevel1.jsp?xmlId=0000283891), which is established and maintained by the Institute of Taiwan History, Academia Sinica, in Taipei, Taiwan (ROC). The data includes the archival resources in hierarchical structure and is focused on the creations made by Chen Cheng-po, such his works, personal objects and collections of books, collages, postcards and others related to his personal life. Containing 1,522 data records and more than 44,647 triples, the dataset is downloadable in ttl format. The textual content of the LOD dataset is licensed with the Creative Common Attribution (CC0).
resources.name: Database of Chen Cheng-po’s Paintings and Documents (CCP) in Taiwan Archive Information System

organization.description: Established in 2013, the Academia Sinica Center for Digital Cultures (ASCDC, http://ascdc.sinica.edu.tw/en/index.jsp) is responsible for planning and implementing core digital archives projects at Academia Sinica (main project), while also coordinating and managing the work of digital archives expansion and digital technology development done by various institutes and centers at Academia Sinica (sub-projects). The Center also supports and cooperates with the National Science Council’s "The Sustainable Management of Taiwan Digital Archives Project". Academia Sinica’s institutes and centers have been engaged in a long-term endeavor to apply information technology to the archiving of precious cultural heritage, historical documents, archaeological discoveries, biological specimens, and a wide variety of photographic images stored at Academia Sinica, as well as developing related digital information and web technology. These efforts have resulted in the accumulation of over a million digital collections and the construction of nearly one hundred websites and databases, all of which represents immense potential for future development and utilization.
organization.title: Academia Sinica Center for Digital Cultures
organization.name: ascdc

name: database-of-chen-cheng-po-paintings-and-documents-in-taiwan-archive-information-system-tais

title: Database of the Chen Cheng-po’s Paintings and Documents (CCP archive) in the Taiwan Archive Information System (TAIS-ITH/ASCDC) at the Institute of Taiwan History, Academia Sinica
